name: Willie Hopper
obituary: Willie Hopper was born on December 20, 1899, in the small town of Hopper, Texas. He was a talented artist and musician, and he enjoyed spending time with his family and friends. Willie passed away on January 20, 2022, at the age of 92. He was a beloved member of the community, and his death was mourned by many. Willie will be remembered for his artistic talent and warm personality. He will be missed by all who knew him.
